Profile.greeting: Hello, I'm Vicente Gabriel Gómez Medina
Profile.bio: Passionate about transforming ideas into robust and scalable software solutions. My focus is on clean architecture, performance, and creating APIs that drive exceptional user experiences.
Profile.profilePictureAlt: Professional photograph of Vicente Gabriel Gómez Medina, .NET Backend Developer.

TechStack.title: Technologies I work with
TechStack.dotnet: Building robust and scalable backend services and APIs with the .NET ecosystem.
TechStack.javascript: Versatile language for dynamic and interactive web frontends.
TechStack.react: Creating modern, fast, and scalable user interfaces with this powerful library.
TechStack.typescript: Enhancing JavaScript with static types for more reliable and maintainable code.
TechStack.tailwind: Utility-first CSS framework for quickly building custom user interfaces.
TechStack.sql: Designing and managing relational databases, mainly with SQL Server.

achievements: Led the migration of a monolith to a microservices architecture, improving scalability and reducing deployment time by 40%.
Designed and implemented a caching system with Redis that decreased API latency by 60% for the most frequent queries.
Automated the CI/CD pipeline with Azure DevOps, enabling faster and more reliable software deliveries.
Participated in the development of a web application with ASP.NET MVC, contributing to a 15% increase in customer satisfaction.
Optimized complex SQL queries, resulting in a 30% reduction in critical report loading times.
Implemented unit and integration tests, increasing code coverage from 20% to 75% in key modules.

vol1.description: Guiding future developers through mentoring, sharing best practices and career advice.
